home.heroText2: Your Trusted Partner in Engineering and Supplies.
home.about1: Al-Solimania Company for Contracting and Electrical Supplies is an Egyptian company that provides the highest levels of quality in the field of contracting and electrical supplies.
home.about2: Established in 2012, the company has achieved outstanding growth rates to become one of the leading companies in the field of supplies, contracting, and designing of electrical networks, as well as manufacturing electrical panels to meet the requirements of the local market. In 2017, Al-Solimania Company witnessed significant innovation in the electrical contracting sector, becoming one of the leading companies in the design and implementation of electrical works, specifically in the hospital sector, industrial sector, and major administrative institutions.

carouselSlides.slogan: Unmatched Quality, Exceptional Craftsmanship, Reliable Results
Precision Engineering, Innovative Design, Unparalleled Service
Exceeding Expectations, Building Dreams, Delivering Excellence
Unleashing Creativity, Transforming Spaces, Inspiring Vision

electricalWork.title: Electrical Work
electricalWork.description: We provide a wide range of electrical products, including:

electricalWorkPage.title: Electrical Work
electricalWorkPage.1: Electrical distribution panels and control panels.
electricalWorkPage.5: Variable speed drives and PLC units.
electricalWorkPage.7: Automatic circuit breakers, contactors, and overload relays.
electricalWorkPage.10: Fire alarm devices and firefighting equipment.

exportPage.title: Export Work
exportPage.2: coating for aluminum sections coated with electrostatic paint
exportPage.3: Export of electrical panels according to required specifications, standard, control, empty, and the possibility of manufacturing according to the required specifications for each country and according to the international code.

product.title: Our Product
product.2: Meter panels for apartments and shops, single-phase and three-phase
product.3: Line panels from 6 lines to 48 lines
product.4: Booths and covers of all sizes
product.5: Control panels according to the required specification

maintain.title: Maintenance contracts
maintain.1: The company has maintenance contracts for monitoring and maintenance
maintain.2: Distribution panels, ATS panels, and lighting units
maintain.5: (Power generators - Air compressors - Production lines - Boilers and steam networks - Gas and diesel igniters)
maintain.8: These contracts do not include spare parts

boilers.title: Steam boilers and heating networks
boilers.1: The boilers are manufactured according to European specifications, ensuring the highest efficiency with minimum energy consumption.
boilers.1r: They provide high protection against exceeding pressure or temperature limits. The boiler is supplied complete with all its components (safety devices, control panel, and all necessary safety equipment).
boilers.3: Installation of boilers, heat exchangers, and their spare parts.
boilers.4: Supplying and installing heating equipment for swimming pools.
boilers.5: Supplying and installing steam, hot water, and air networks for services.
boilers.6: Supplying spare parts for laundry equipment.
boilers.7: Digital control for all boiler functions.
boilers.8: Fast reaching of the desired temperature.

mecsup.title: Mechanic supplies
mecsup.p1: The company undertakes contracts and maintenance for bathrooms of various sizes.
mecsup.p2: The company supplies and installs swimming pool heaters of various sizes using heat exchangers for hotels, resorts, sports clubs, and health facilities.
mecsup.9: Supply of all Industrial Safety Equipment
